script:
1). How do you find our city so far?
I used Google Earth.
I like it very much. 
I took the number-3 bus.
2). How about putting Jim in charge?
That's a good idea. 
No, I'll write a check.
He'll be here soon.
3). When are you going to submit your cost estimates?
I have done it on Tuesday.
By the middle of next week. 
I won't finish them yet.
